caption.center: THE STATE OF WASHINGTON, Respondent, v. MARCUS IVAN PETERSON, Appellant.

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division Three.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from judgments of the Superior Court for Spokane County, Nos. 95-1-00505-6, 95-1-00308-8, Michael E. Donohue, J., entered May 3, 1995.

opinion_text.unpublished: Reversed by unpublished opinion per Munson, J. Pro Tem., concurred in by Schultheis, A.C.J., and Thompson, J.
